mapper.select: select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",d.total_user_num as "userCount" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.area_type='Indoor' and d.statistics_time=#{maxDate} and d.total_user_num > 0

select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",d.total_user_num as "userCount" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type='Indoor' and to_date(d.statistics_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')=to_date(#{dateStr},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') and d.total_user_num > 0

select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",d.total_user_num as "userCount",d.stadium_no as "region" ,to_char(to_date(d.statistics_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as "times" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.area_type='Indoor' and d.total_user_num >= #{warnNum} and d.statistics_time=#{maxDate} order by d.stadium_no desc
select d.stadium_no as "region",nvl(sum(d.total_user_num),0) as "userCount" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d where d.area_type='Indoor' group by d.stadium_no

select nvl(sum(d.total_user_num),0) from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d where d.area_type='Indoor' and d.stadium_no=#{region} and to_date(d.statistics_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')=to_date(#{maxDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')
select max(d.statistics_time) from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d where d.area_type='Indoor'
